website_summaries.verdict: High-quality from a respected athletic wear company. Loose, comfy fit is suitable for sports or casual dress.
cons: Some wearers don't like the 100% polyester

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting regular track pants, but these are warmer microfleece inside. Never seen these before and ordering more for our Montana weather.
customer_reviews.author: MTcanyncrittr

customer_reviews.title: pants too long
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered both a black and navy pair, at the same time, though they came from different shippers. The navy were much too long. Quality was as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Binderman

customer_reviews.title: Daddy long leg
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 pairs of these. Excellent for tall kids. They seem the be cut with a slighter longer inseam than other adidas pants he has in the same size
customer_reviews.author: Noonecares

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my 12 almost 13 year old. Length almost too long when not wearing sneakers. (he's 5'5 or a touch more)
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be men's pants. L not even close to fitting. They fit me, adult male 5'9" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them and they are a match for mine. Comfortable and they for well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Sporty but nice
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually let my son wears sweatpants with these track pants look really nice and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for money! My son use it for martial arts and fell comfort with this pants
customer_reviews.author: Celines Vega

customer_reviews.title: grandson loved them
customer_reviews.text: my 13 year old grandson lives in Adddas. These look of good quality. He said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: the reader K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick pair of sweats
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these pants b/c they are very warm and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 ⭐️ actually...
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely materials. Good looking. Larger than expected for a boys 18 compared to what the big box stores sell as a size 18 track pant. Keeping though, as they will get grown into. Probably will get the next size down for now.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteDove

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that these pants are actually fleece lined. Style is great, fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: bettylrf

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and we'll fitting pants. My grandson loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: JANTIM

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fits well, warm, comfortable to run in (track and field) in winter.
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, looks good, warm for winter, good for track and field in winter.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: love these pants, fit is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: grandson lives in these pants! Quality and fit is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great pants. A nice alternative to fleece jogger for the winter
customer_reviews.author: Shari Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for pants. Perfect for my son to wear to and from practice in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Warm athletic pants
customer_reviews.text: The pants are warm and fit pretty well, although the waist is a bit large. However, the pants have internal drawstrings, so you can adjust the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these pants but cannot find in stores. Glad to find them on Amazon. Soft and comfy. May buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline G. Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - not baggy - but size 10 a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - not baggy - but size 10 a bit too long for my 10 year old to wear - maybe in a few months...
customer_reviews.author: MarylandM

customer_reviews.title: ... both sets we purchased for him and the fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves both sets we purchased for him and the fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Bought a youth small and it was way longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a youth small and it was way longer than any other brand of youth small- at least 3 inches longer than underarmour or Nike youth small pants
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and they fit him perfectly. Didn't shrink in the wash either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, just a bit larger than other Adidas pants that we own.
customer_reviews.author: nrl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Little Man loves these to the point of wearing them to school every day
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Quality great but way too big. Order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: NancyG31

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present and the quality is absolutely phenomenal...thinking of buying them another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good pants
customer_reviews.text: jersey type knited nylony pants, come up a little long, not that, that is a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Flame

customer_reviews.title: Better for chunkier kids
customer_reviews.text: Better for chunkier kids. My son is very slim and these are way too roomy. They are thick and substantial pants -- definitely not for summer.
customer_reviews.author: 47yroldmom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality run slightly longer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pants. Sort of a heavy fleece. They do run a little long. My son is 56 inches tall and the 10/12 were about 2 inches long on him. So they run a little big. But a good product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peary

product_meta.title: adidas Boys' Tech Fleece Pant
product_meta.description: Boys will love the loose fit of these fleece pants. They are warm, comfortable, and stylish.
